title: Rank Que and force dodge
body:
I was in my Solo Que promotional series and when I was in champion select, all 5 members of my team was kicked out and then reconnected to the champion select screen but we were not able to ban any champions. After the game dodge and I lost one promotional game which is crucial. Is there any solution to this problem as it would be unfair to lose one game when it was not the player fault.

This occurs 10 minutes before this post was published.

Shaneki.
